/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnAplyHistList */
SELECT A.APLYID , B.TME_SCHDLID , D.PRGRMID , E.SAREAID , E.SAREA_NM , D.PRGRM_NM , D.OPER_FOM_CD , F.CD_NM OPER_FOM_NM , GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(B.DE, '.', '-')SEPARATOR', ') DE , C.TMEID , C.TME_NM , A.STTS_CD , G.CD_NM STTS_NM , D.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , D.STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , H.QESTNRID APLCNT_DGSTFN_QESTNRID , I.QESTNRID STDNT_DGSTFN_QESTNRID , DATE_FORMAT(B.DE, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY_SCHDL Z ON Z.APLYID = A.APLYID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL B ON B.TME_SCHDLID = Z.TME_SCHDLID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME C ON C.TMEID = B.TMEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM D ON D.PRGRMID = C.PRGRMID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_SAREA E ON E.SAREAID = D.SAREAID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD F ON F.CD = D.OPER_FOM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD G ON G.CD = A.STTS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY H ON H.SRVYID = D.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY I ON I.SRVYID = D.STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID WHERE 1=1 AND A.USERID = #{user.userid} AND B.TME_SCHDLID IS NOT NULL
AND D.PRGRM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchPrgrmNm},'%')
GROUP BY A.APLYID

/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnAplyHistInfo */ SELECT A.APLYID , D.PRGRMID , E.SAREAID , E.SAREA_NM , D.PRGRM_NM , D.EDU_NOPE , D.EDU_HR_MNT , CONCAT((SELECT t1.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD t1 WHERE t1.CD = F.UPPR_CD), ' ', F.CD_NM) AS SIGNGU_DESC , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TC.TRGT_CD SEPARATOR',') FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TRGT_MAPNG TC WHERE TC.PRGRMID = D.PRGRMID) AS TRGT_CD , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TB.CD_NM SEPARATOR',') FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TRGT_MAPNG TA, TB_CMM_CD TB WHERE TA.PRGRMID = D.PRGRMID and TA.TRGT_CD = TB.CD) AS TRGT_NM , GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(B.DE, '.', '-')SEPARATOR', ') DE , C.TMEID , C.TME_NM , A.STTS_CD , G.CD_NM STTS_NM , D.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , D.STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID , H.QESTNRID APLCNT_DGSTFN_QESTNRID , I.QESTNRID STDNT_DGSTFN_QESTNRID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY_SCHDL Z ON Z.APLYID = A.APLYID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL B ON B.TME_SCHDLID = Z.TME_SCHDLID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME C ON C.TMEID = B.TMEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM D ON D.PRGRMID = C.PRGRMID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_SAREA E ON E.SAREAID = D.SAREAID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD F ON F.CD = A.SIGNGU_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD G ON G.CD = A.STTS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY H ON H.SRVYID = D.APLCNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY I ON I.SRVYID = D.STDNT_DGSTFN_SRVYID WHERE 1=1 AND A.APLYID = #{aplyid} AND B.TME_SCHDLID = #{tmeSchdlid} GROUP BY A.APLYID

/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnAplyHistDetail */ SELECT A.APLYID , Z.TME_SCHDLID , GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(B.DE, '.', '-')SEPARATOR', ') DE , C.TMEID , C.TME_NM , A.REG_DT AS APLY_DT , A.INSTID , NULLIF(E.INST_NM, '') INST_NM , NULLIF(A.USERID, '') APLY_USERID , NULLIF(F.NM, '') APLY_USER_NM , NULLIF(A.ADDR, '') ADDR , NULLIF(A.ADDR_DTL, '') ADDR_DTL , NULLIF(A.TELNO, '') TELNO , NULLIF(F.MOBLPHON, '') MOBLPHON , NULLIF(A.EML, '') EML , NULLIF(A.FXNO, '') FXNO , A.EDU_NOPE , NULLIF(A.RMRK, '') RMRK , A.STTS_CD , D.CD_NM AS STTS_NM ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(EDU_TRGT_CD SEPARATOR',') FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY_EDU_TRGT WHERE APLYID = #{aplyid} ) AS TRGT_CD ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TB.CD_NM SEPARATOR', ') FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY_EDU_TRGT TA, TB_CMM_CD TB WHERE TA.APLYID = #{aplyid} and TA.EDU_TRGT_CD = TB.CD) AS TRGT_NM , A.MDFCN_DT , A.MDFRID , A.REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_APLY_SCHDL Z ON Z.APLYID = A.APLYID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME_SCHDL B ON B.TME_SCHDLID = Z.TME_SCHDLID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TME C ON C.TMEID = B.TMEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON D.CD = A.STTS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST E ON E.INSTID = A.INSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_USER F ON F.USERID = A.USERID WHERE A.APLYID = #{aplyid} AND B.TME_SCHDLID = #{tmeSchdlid} GROUP BY A.APLYID
/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnSrvyInfo */ SELECT A.SRVYID , A.QESTNRID , A.SRVY_NM , A.SRVY_PRD_CD , A.BGNG_DE , A.END_DE , A.USE_YN FROM TB_CMM_SRVY A WHERE SRVYID = #{srvyid}

/* MvmnAplyHistDao.selectMvmnSrvySendList */ SELECT A.SBMSNID , A.SITEID , A.SRVYID , B.QESTNRID , A.INFNT_PRGRM_APLYID , A.MVMN_PRGRM_APLYID , A.USERID , A.PRTPNT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A.SBMSN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SBMSN_DT , A.MDFCN_DT , A.MDFRID , A.REG_DT , A.RGTRID FROM TB_CMM_SRVY_SBMSN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_SRVY B ON A.SRVYID = B.SRVYID WHERE A.SRVYID = #{srvyid}
AND A.MVMN_PRGRM_APLYID = #{mvmnPrgrmAplyid}
